properties.name: fes.auc.url
properties.description: This is the authentication server ip and port. i.e http://192.168.58.100:8090/AUC

properties.name: fes.fes.ip
properties.description: This is the the ip of the FES

properties.name: fes.nfd.ip
properties.description: This is the nfd server ip. i.e 127.0.0.1
